DOC.brief_summary: Cigarette smoking is the most important modifiable cardiovascular risk factor leading to endothelial dysfunction and was suggested to impair arterial regeneration.The aim of the study was to investigate the effect of smoking on vascular response to transradial coronary angiography (TCA).
DOC.criteria: all subjects underwent a TCA acute inflammation cardiac arrhythmia renal failure heart failure (NYHA IIIV) CRP > 1 mg/dl malignant disease
